title: Eating Pizza with a fork & knife is so much better.
body:
Why do people still eat pizza with their hands?

Let's go over the advantages for each.

Fork & Knife:
-Healthier because you spend a lot more time consuming a single piece (for those who don't know, it is healthier to eat a meal slower).
-You don't get grease all over your hands (which imo is pretty gross and makes me feel uncomfortable). 
-You don't have to "commit" to a piece of pizza. This combines the other two points. When you pick up a piece of pizza by hand, you've already ruined your hands with grease and pizza sauce, so you have to finish it right then before doing anything else. With fork and knife however, you can eat at your own convenience.

Hands:
-??????????????????????????

Go ahead and argue, you know i'm right. Try it.
